page.title: 04EMPLOYMENT - RURAL WILTSHIRE
page.content: Within the area there are three main types of employment; general farming, pig farming and horticulture and the jobs available are mainly for male workers. The majority of people wprking on the land and for the pig rearing unit actually live locally; often in tied cottages. In Upper Upham there is an arable farm of 700 acres which employs farm workers to cultivate the land and tend livestock. The farms are highly mechanised and therefore the actual employment level is low. A great number of the residents of Upper Upham work outside the area; many in more highly paid professions. There is no public transport so those travelling to work need access to a car, motorbike or bicycle.
